encryptedVerifiableVote.description: The encrypted verifiable vote containing the encrypted vote, the encrypted partial Choice Return Codes, and zero-knowledge proofs demonstrating the equivalence between them. The encrypted verifiable vote corresponds to the output of the CreateVote algorithm executed by the voting client.
